metadata.Title: CVE-2014-0179

Platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise High Performance Computing 15
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Basesystem 15
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 15

metadata.Description: libvirt 0.7.5 through 1.2.x before 1.2.5 allows local users to cause a denial of service (read block and hang) via a crafted XML document containing an XML external entity declaration in conjunction with an entity reference to the (1) virConnectCompareCPU or (2) virConnectBaselineCPU API method, related to an XML External Entity (XXE) issue. NOTE: this issue was SPLIT per ADT3 due to different affected versions of some vectors. CVE-2014-5177 is used for other API methods.

criterions.comment: SUSE Linux Enterprise Desktop 15 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise High Performance Computing 15 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Basesystem 15 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 15 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 15 is installed
